name: Chug! Chug! Chug!
description:
A game made for the Beer SK game jam, chug as much beer as you can to beat your friend in a beer drinking contest!

Controls:

Player 1 - A for left hand, S for right hand

Player 2 - K for left hand, L for right hand

*To start, each player just presses any of the their buttons

(Hint: waiting till your mug is full can get you more points!)
